data.title: Top 10 Highest Grossers in the History of Kannada Cinema
data.meta_description: Kannada Cinema has an History of over 80 years in Indian Cinema. Here is the List of the Top 10 Grossers in the History of Kannada Cinema. 1
data.text:
Kannada Cinema has a history of over 80 years in Indian Cinema. Here is the list of the Top 10 Grossers in the history of Kannada Cinema.

1.RAAJAKUMARA

Raajakumara Starring Puneeth Rajkumar,Directed by Santosh Annanddram and produced by Hombale Productions stands as the top most grosser of KFI. It recieved great response from all corners.

Release Date - 24th March,2017.

Gross - 81 Crores

Net Share - 48.3 crores

2.MUNGAARU MALE

Mungaaru Male stands as one of the best movies of KFI. It was remade into other languages. Starring Ganesh and Pooja Gandhi in Lead Roles, it was directed by Yogaraj bhat.

Release Date - 29th December,2006

Gross - 55 Crores

Net Share - 37.6 Crores

3.MR. AND MRS. RAMACHARI

Mr. And Mrs. Ramachari Starring Yash and Radhika Pandit made a special mark in the Industry.It was directed by Santosh Annanddram and produced by Jayanna Combines.

Release Date - 25th December,2014

Gross - 50 Crores

Net Share - 34.2 Crores

4.KIRIK PARTY

Undoubtedly one of the best movies in recent times. Kirik Party Starring Rakshit Shetty made huge noise at the box office.

Release Date - 30th December,2017.

Gross - 45 Crores

Net Share - 30.8 Crores

5.HEBBULI

Hebbuli starring Kiccha Sudeep was an amazing movie as well.Directed by Krishna and Produced By SRV Productions and Umapathy Films.

Release date - 23rd February,2017.

Gross - 43.7 Crores

Net share - 30.2 Crores

6.DODDMANE HUDGA

Doddmane Hudga Starring Puneeth Rajkumar and Radhika Pandit in lead roles marks the 25th film of the actor. Directed by Suri and Produced M.Govinda of Ajay Pictures.

Release Date - 30th September,2016.

Gross - 43.5 Crores

Net share - 27.8 Crores

7.KOTIGOBBA 2

Kotigobba 2 was another great movie in the industry. Starring Kiccha Sudeep and Nithya Menon in the lead roles.Directed by K.S.Ravikumar and Produced by Rambabu Productions.

Release date - 12th August,2016

Gross - 40 crores

Net share - 26.4 Crores

8.MANIKKYA

Manikkya was another milestone in Sudeep's Career.Directed and produced by Sudeep Himself.The Re-Make of Telugu Movie Mirchi.

Release date - 1st May,2014

Gross - 39.5 Crores

Net Share - 27 crores

9.KRANTIVEERA SANGOLLI RAYANNA

KVSR was a benchmark in Darshan's Career. The movie ran for an year in the theaters. Directed by Naganna and Produced by Anand Appugol

Release date -1st November,2012

Gross - 38 crores

Net share - 26.2 Crores

10.UPPI 2

Uppi 2 was another Upendra Trademark movie. The sequel of Upendra.The movie released in two languages Kannada and Telugu.

Release Date - 14th August,2015

Gross - 36 crores

Net Share - 24.6 crores

Source : IMDB
